materials.summary: This topic introduces the fundamental concepts and origins of dance throughout history.

sections.heading: Early Origins
sections.content:
Dance has been an integral part of human culture since ancient times. Evidence of dance can be traced back to prehistoric cave paintings and early rituals.

These early forms served multiple purposes: communication, celebration, religious ceremonies, and social bonding.

sections.heading: Classical Periods
sections.content: As civilizations developed, dance evolved into more structured forms. Different cultures developed unique styles that reflected their values and traditions.
